content.rendered:
Directed by Rohit Jugraj

Written by Rohit Jugraj. Amit Khan. Surmeet Maavi. Sartaj Singh Pannu

Cast Ranjit Bawa (Fateh). Manav Vij (Harry). Mandy Takhar (Laali). Elnaaz Norouzi (Naaz). Guggu Gill (Balveer Singh). Mahabir Bhullar (Pargat Singh). James Breakey (Captain Ruff). Steven Ebbers (Hakan). Oliver Meyer-Bothling (Captain Jordin). Henry Sewell (McCool). Howard Richards (Fred). Nicholas James Ripley (Dick Duff). Seema Kaushal (Friendly appearance). Sukhbir Singh Batth (Sant Singh- Harry’s Dad (as Sukhbir Singh)).Jatinder Kaur. Gurinder Dimpy (Commentator) . Navdeep Bajwa (Pulsiya). Diana Evseeva (Nurse). Francesca Fraser (Polo Match Spectator). Gurmukh Ginni (Ginni Amli). Sonia Goswami (University Student). Lewis Johnson (English University Hockey Player). Phelim Kelly (Court Clerk). Hassan Khan (Sultan). Geri Krasniqi (University Student). Bryan Lawrence (Coach Brian Clayton). Adam Lazarus (Andrew Scott (Lawyer)). Bastiaan Leerkotte (Jonathan). Noor Lila (Best Friend (as Shabnam Karimzada)). Alpesh Malaviya (University Student). Kate Margo (Girlfriend (as Mona Margo)). Soni Marwah (University Student).Sonam Nanwani.Sumeet Rai. Jasbir Rishi (Coach Grewal).Sunny Sandhu. Katya Shulepko (Nurse). Alistair Taylor (Clutterbuck). Bruis van Vlijmen (Lonny (Hockey Player #7))

Languages Punjabi

Producers Kavanjit Hayre. Talwinder Hayre. Rohit Jugraj. Manish Nair. Gudit Singh. Sagoon Wagh. Sridevi Shetty Wagh. Bharat S Raawat. Malkit Bharj

Production Kuausmedia Entertainment
